entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
